p: Essential oils (EOs): Spanish origanum oil of Thymbra capitata (L.) Cav., coriander oil of Coriandrum sativum L., Spanish marjoram oil of Thymus mastichina (L.) L. from Sigma Aldrich (Darmstadt, Germany). Chemical reagents: dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) and sodium hypochlorite bought from Chempur (Piekary Śląskie, Poland), phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), tryptic soybean broth (TSB), tryptic soy agar (TSA), buffered peptone water (BPW) and glycerol from BTL (Łódź, Poland), Palcam Agar plus selective supplement (PA) bought from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany).
